Articles.Content:
You all know these, so lets jump straight into it.

(NOTE: I'm going to start it in a KSP related way, but it might not last that way all the way through).

You are about to attempt a landing on the Mun and your Command Module and Lunar Lander are about to separate, however, you realize that only one kerbal can fit into the Lander. Do you pick:

a) Jeb

Bill

c) Bob

d) Abandon the attempt and try a new crew.

Choose wisely, you never know what will happen next.
I pick Bill. He doesn't have panic attacks like Bob but isn't insane like Jeb. He will be perfect for landing the module.

Im going to go ahead and go with Jeb, sometimes his no fears and insanity comes in handy.

Edited October 15, 2012 by Colderjake1524
I'll go with bob, to finish it out

Right Nutt chose first so you choose Bill.

You tell Bill to enter the capsule and he seperates it as normal, however he got a bit panicky on the descent and used nearly all your fuel, not enough to get back up.

Do you:

a)Try and Jetpack him back up

b)Abandon him

c)Try and rescue with the module Bob and Jeb are in.

d)Send a rescue mission.

Maybe ill continue this.

You send a rescue mission, but the rescue mission crashes! now there is 3 kerbals stranded!

will you

(A: Ignore

(B: Send another rescue mission

(C: Send a rocket to crash into all of them

(D: Hit "End flight"

(E: Send a fully equiped Mechjeb+DEMV rover to them

A)space

a]space station blows up

b]munmites in your pants

c]go into space

A)space

a]space station blows up

b]munmites in your pants

c]go into space

\

I don't think you control this...
